meanings.definition: Resembling rubber in texture or flexibility.
meanings.sent1: The bouncy ball was rubberlike, stretching easily when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The rubberlike material of the eraser made it easy to grip.
meanings.sent3: The rubberlike gloves made the clown's hands look comically large.
meanings.sent4: Her rubberlike resilience in the face of challenges was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The rubberlike consistency of the slime toy was oddly satisfying to touch.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of rubber.
meanings.sent1: The rubberlike seal around the window kept the cold air out.
meanings.sent2: The rubberlike texture of the tire provided a good grip on the road.
meanings.sent3: The rubberlike behavior of the bouncy ball surprised the children.
meanings.sent4: His rubberlike ability to bounce back from setbacks inspired his teammates.
meanings.sent5: The rubberlike elasticity of the band made it perfect for stretching exercises.
